text:
At first, I had decided to do a law degree because I was a big fan of the lawyer Alex Dupont but also because I wanted naively to spread some equality and justice in the entire world. During my year at the University of Law in Paris 1, I learned many things about politics, humans rights, The american Constitution, The Bill of Rights... However, I knew that I was not as blossomed as I thought in my studies. That is why I have decided to stop after obtaining my first year of Law. Then, I tried to make an introspection on myself, to know what I wanted to do and to find who I really am. I entered a Communication degree at Rennes 2. Indeed, I love to share with people around me. It's important for me to keep some good relationship with everyone. That's why I knew that I was made for these studies. I don't have any source of inspiration for theses studies, it's just about personality and personal skills. Maybe, the jobs I did during the summer, have helped me to see that I was done for this. I worked in many shops such as Gerard Darel or Burton of Paris which make me wanted to work in communication.
 "This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here."
